verses.verse: Then we <S%H6437>turned<s%>, and went <S%H5927>up<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>: and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us, he and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, to <S%H4421>battle<s%> at <S%H154>Edrei<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> him not: for I will <S%H5414>deliver<s%> him, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>, and his <S%H776>land<s%>, into thy <S%H3027>hand<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%> unto him as thou <S%H6213>didst<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%>, which <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>.

So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into our <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H5747>Og<s%> also, the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, and all his <S%H5971>people<s%>: and we <S%H5221>smote<s%> him until none was <S%H7604>left<s%> to him <S%H8300>remaining<s%>.

And we <S%H3920>took<s%> all his <S%H5892>cities<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, there was not a <S%H7151>city<s%> which we <S%H3947>took<s%> not from them, <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, all the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%>, the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

All these <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H1219>fenced<s%> with <S%H1364>high<s%> <S%H2346>walls<s%>, <S%H1817>gates<s%>, and <S%H1280>bars<s%>; beside <S%H6521>unwalled<s%> <S%H5892>towns<s%> a <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%>.

And we utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them, as we <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, utterly <S%H2763>destroying<s%> the <S%H4962>men<s%>, <S%H802>women<s%>, and <S%H2945>children<s%>, of every <S%H5892>city<s%>.
But all the <S%H929>cattle<s%>, and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, we took for a <S%H962>prey<s%> to ourselves.

And we <S%H3947>took<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H3947>out<s%> of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> that was on this <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, from the <S%H5158>river<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%> unto <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2768>Hermon<s%>;
( Which <S%H2768>Hermon<s%> the <S%H6722>Sidonians<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H8303>Sirion<s%>; and the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H7121>call<s%> it <S%H8149>Shenir<s%>;)

All the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4334>plain<s%>, and all <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, unto <S%H5548>Salchah<s%> and <S%H154>Edrei<s%>, <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

For only <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H7604>remained<s%> of the <S%H3499>remnant<s%> of <S%H7497>giants<s%>; behold, his <S%H6210>bedstead<s%> was a <S%H6210>bedstead<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>; is it <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H7237>Rabbath<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>? <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> was the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it, after the <S%H520>cubit<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%>.

And this <S%H776>land<s%>, which we <S%H3423>possessed<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, from <S%H6177>Aroer<s%>, which is by the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%>, and <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> thereof, <S%H5414>gave<s%> I unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and to the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>.

And the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, and all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, being the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> of <S%H5747>Og<s%>, <S%H5414>gave<s%> I unto the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; all the <S%H2256>region<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%>, with all <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, <S%H1931>which<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H7497>giants<s%>.

<S%H2971>Jair<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> all the <S%H2256>country<s%> of <S%H709>Argob<s%> unto the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H1651>Geshuri<s%> and <S%H4602>Maachathi<s%>; and <S%H7121>called<s%> them after his own <S%H8034>name<s%>, <S%H1316>Bashanhavothjair<s%> <S%H2334><s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And I <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> unto <S%H4353>Machir<s%>.

And unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%> and unto the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%> I <S%H5414>gave<s%> from <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> even unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H769>Arnon<s%> <S%H8432>half<s%> the <S%H5158>valley<s%>, and the <S%H1366>border<s%> even unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H2999>Jabbok<s%>, which is the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%>;

The <S%H6160>plain<s%> also, and <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, and the <S%H1366>coast<s%> thereof, from <S%H3672>Chinnereth<s%> even unto the <S%H3220>sea<s%> of the <S%H6160>plain<s%>, even the <S%H4417>salt<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%>, under <S%H798>Ashdothpisgah<s%> <S%H794><s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%>. Ashdothpisgah; or, the springs of Pisgah, or, the hill

And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> you this <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it: ye shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, all that are <S%H1121>meet<s%> for the <S%H2428>war<s%>. meet: Heb. sons of power

But your <S%H802>wives<s%>, and your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and your <S%H4735>cattle<s%>, ( for I <S%H3045>know<s%> that ye have <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H4735>cattle<s%>,) shall <S%H3427>abide<s%> in your <S%H5892>cities<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you;

Until the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have given <S%H5117>rest<s%> unto your <S%H251>brethren<s%>, as well as unto you, and until they also <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> them <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: and then shall ye <S%H7725>return<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> unto his <S%H3425>possession<s%>, which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you.

And I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H6213>done<s%> unto these <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>: so shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> unto all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> whither thou <S%H5674>passest<s%>.
Ye shall not <S%H3372>fear<s%> them: for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> he shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> for you.
And I <S%H2603>besought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, thou hast <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H7200>shew<s%> thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> thy <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, and thy <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>: for what <S%H410>God<s%> is there in <S%H8064>heaven<s%> or in <S%H776>earth<s%>, that can <S%H6213>do<s%> according to thy <S%H4639>works<s%>, and according to thy <S%H1369>might<s%>?

I pray thee, let me go <S%H5674>over<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> that is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, that <S%H2896>goodly<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H5674>wroth<s%> with me for your sakes, and would not <S%H8085>hear<s%> me: and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, Let it <S%H7227>suffice<s%> thee; <S%H1696>speak<s%> no <S%H3254>more<s%> unto me of this <S%H1697>matter<s%>.

Get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H7218>top<s%> of <S%H6449>Pisgah<s%>, and lift <S%H5375>up<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%>, and <S%H6828>northward<s%>, and <S%H8486>southward<s%>, and <S%H4217>eastward<s%>, and <S%H7200>behold<s%> it with thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: for thou shalt not go <S%H5674>over<s%> this <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>. Pisgah: or, the hill

But <S%H6680>charge<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, and <S%H2388>encourage<s%> him, and <S%H553>strengthen<s%> him: for he shall go <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>, and he shall cause them to <S%H5157>inherit<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which thou shalt <S%H7200>see<s%>.
So we <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1047>Bethpeor<s%>.
